note: GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Per capita consumption of low-carbon energy vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Low-carbon energy is the sum of nuclear and renewable energy, measured in [megawatt-hours](#dod:watt-hours) of [primary energy](#dod:primaryenergy) per person, using the [substitution method](#dod:substitutionmethod). GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
